revised_title: Kinetic Behavior of N2(B) and Vibrational Distributions in Nitrogen
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the kinetic behavior of active nitrogen and studied the vibrational distributions in nitrogen molecules. They found that the vibrational distribution in N2(B) is similar to that in N2(A), suggesting a complex formation mechanism. The results provide insight into the population of high vibrational levels in N2(B) and the role of N2(A) as a precursor.
